short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a short video summary below each video on YouTube Home page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SkipIt YouTube Summarizer is a handy browser extension designed to enhance your YouTube browsing experience. With this innovative tool, you can now access concise video summaries directly on the YouTube Home page.

YouTube Summarizer streamlines your video consumption by providing a brief and informative summary below each video. Gone are the days of wasting time on lengthy videos that may not align with your interests. Now, you can quickly assess the content's relevance, saving you valuable time and effort.

This extension remains unbiased and emotionally neutral, delivering objective summaries that capture the essence of each video. Whether you're seeking the latest news updates, educational content, or simply looking for entertainment, YouTube Summarizer assists in making informed decisions.

Embrace efficiency and gain control over your YouTube browsing with YouTube Summarizer. Spend less time scrolling and more time engaging with the content that matters most to you. Download the extension today and unlock a streamlined YouTube experience like never before.
